name: Luxembourg's Little Helper
title: Minimal Aid from Luxembourg
description: In 2015, Kyrgyzstan received one of the lowest net bilateral aid flows from Luxembourg, amounting to just $9,999.99. This highlights a minimal financial relationship with the European nation.

name: Gender Equality Progress
title: Strong Gender Equality Rating
description: Kyrgyzstan achieved a commendable CPIA gender equality rating of 4.5 in 2023, reflecting significant progress in gender equality initiatives and policies.

name: Clean Hands, Healthy Lives
title: High Urban Handwashing Facilities
description: In 2019, 98.66% of Kyrgyzstan's urban population had access to basic handwashing facilities with soap and water, showcasing the country's commitment to public health in urban areas.

name: Nationwide Hygiene Success
title: Widespread Handwashing Facilities
description: By 2019, 98.28% of Kyrgyzstan's total population had access to basic handwashing facilities, indicating a strong national focus on hygiene and sanitation.
